hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottle#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: What is a Hylian? A miserable little pile of secrets!

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Poacher's Saw#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #spider behind webs# in a grotto holds #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the Lizalfos in Dodongo's Cavern like to play in lava.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found in #the Market#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #0# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Epona's Song#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Megaton Hammer#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Fire Keese Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.
